title: Kenai Fjords National Park: Rules and Regulations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Rules and Regulations               Rules and Regulations       There are a variety of rules and regulations that help us protect park resources and provide visitors with a safe and enjoyable experience. Please see specific pages included in the rules and regulations section for answers to frequently asked questions about what is and is not permitted in Kenai Fjords National Park. For questions regarding firearms please click here. If you have other questions please see the Superintendent's Compendium of Regulations for further information or use the following links to applicable state and federal laws:  Marine Viewing Guidelines Fishing Regulations Code of Federal Regulations Alaska State Law  Specific questions about Park regulations may also be addressed to the Park Superintendent.
